call_title: Staking w/UTXO Model - MGPai - Implementing Native Token Staking on Ergo | Ergo Meetup 2025

open_questions.question: What if the staking platform goes down?
open_questions.context: Concern about data availability and security if the platform operator disappears

open_questions.question: How can you recover if the data is just all hashes?
open_questions.context: Follow-up question about data recovery when hashes are non-reversible

open_questions.question: Can we have a HODLerg natively within the Nautilus wallet itself?
open_questions.context: Suggestion to integrate HODLerg as a native app within Nautilus wallet

key_facts.fact: MGPai worked on implementing a native token staking platform on Cardano over the last year
key_facts.speaker: MGPai

key_facts.fact: UTXOs stand for unspent transaction outputs
key_facts.speaker: MGPai

key_facts.fact: On Ergo, ErgoScript has AVL tree as a native data structure within the language
key_facts.speaker: MGPai

key_facts.fact: The root hash is a fixed size string of 32 bytes
key_facts.speaker: MGPai

key_facts.fact: Ergo node has 20-30 gigs storage compared to Ethereum's 2-3 terabytes
key_facts.speaker: MGPai

key_facts.fact: On Palm staking every week, people can claim their rewards
key_facts.speaker: MGPai

key_facts.fact: Cardano went from 80 cents to 27 cents in a flash due to mass liquidations
key_facts.speaker: MGPai

key_facts.fact: The staking platform is live on Cardano at palm-economy.io
key_facts.speaker: MGPai

key_facts.fact: Currently, there are no plans to do it on Ergo
key_facts.speaker: MGPai
